explanation:
Note:
* addMapping

public void addMapping(java.lang.String namespace, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class clazz)
Defines a direct mapping from a namespace and name to a java class (and vice versa)

options.A: "/abc” is mapped to "myservlet". The servletSecurityElementy applies to both "/abc" and "/def".
options.C: Both "/abc" and "/def" are mapped to "myservlet". The servletSecurityElementy applies to "/def".
options.B: Both "/abc" and "/def" are mapped to "myservlet". The servletSecurityElementy applies to "/abc".
options.E: Both "/abc" and "/def" are mapped to "myservlet". The servletSecurityElementy applies to "/abc", but the behavior for "/def" is not specified.
options.D: Both "/abc" and "/def" are mapped to "myservlet". The servletSecurityElementy applies to both "/abc" and "/def".
